channel.title: Sourcesafe on Thomas Chester's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sourcesafe on Thomas Chester's Blog

item.title: Migrating from SourceSafe to Mercurial
item.description: In this post, I will describe two methods to migrate source controlled projects from Microsoft SourceSafe to Mercurial. The first method involves only migration of the latest code version; and the second method the migration of both objects and history.
